metadata.title: CVE-2024-0093 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU software for Linux contains a vulnerability where it can exposesensitive information to an actor that is not explicitly authorized to haveaccess to that information. A successful exploit of this vulnerabilitymight lead to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
